verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* Eliphaz \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w Temanite|strong="H8489"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*,

\w Should|strong="H2450"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w man|strong="H2450"\w* \w make|strong="H6030"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w vain|strong="H7307"\w* \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w*, \w And|strong="H6030"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* himself \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*?

Should \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w reason|strong="H1697"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w unprofitable|strong="H5532"\w* \w talk|strong="H1697"\w*, \w Or|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w speeches|strong="H4405"\w* \w wherewith|strong="H1697"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w can|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H1697"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H3276"\w*?
Yea, \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* doest \w away|strong="H1639"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w*, \w And|strong="H6440"\w* hinderest devotion \w before|strong="H6440"\w* God.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thine \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* teacheth thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, \w And|strong="H6310"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* choosest \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w crafty|strong="H6175"\w*.

Thine own \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w condemneth|strong="H7561"\w* \w thee|strong="H6030"\w*, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w*; Yea, thine own \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w testify|strong="H6030"\w* against \w thee|strong="H6030"\w*.

Art \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H7223"\w* \w was|strong="H3205"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w*? Or wast \w thou|strong="H6440"\w* \w brought|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*?

Hast \w thou|strong="H8085"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w secret|strong="H5475"\w* \w counsel|strong="H5475"\w* \w of|strong="H2451"\w* \w God|strong="H2451"\w*? \w And|strong="H2451"\w* dost \w thou|strong="H8085"\w* \w limit|strong="H1639"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* thyself?

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w*, \w that|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*? \w What|strong="H4100"\w* understandest \w thou|strong="H3045"\w*, \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w us|strong="H3045"\w*?

\w With|strong="H3117"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* gray-headed \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w very|strong="H1571"\w* \w aged|strong="H3453"\w* \w men|strong="H3453"\w*, \w Much|strong="H3524"\w* \w elder|strong="H3117"\w* \w than|strong="H1571"\w* \w thy|strong="H3117"\w* father.

\w Are|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w consolations|strong="H8575"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* God \w too|strong="H4480"\w* \w small|strong="H4592"\w* \w for|strong="H1697"\w* thee, Even \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* gentle \w toward|strong="H4480"\w* thee?

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* doth \w thy|strong="H3947"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w carry|strong="H3947"\w* \w thee|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w*? \w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w flash|strong="H7335"\w*,

\w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w against|strong="H7307"\w* God \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w turnest|strong="H7725"\w* \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w And|strong="H7725"\w* lettest \w words|strong="H4405"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*?

\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* man, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w clean|strong="H2135"\w*? \w And|strong="H3205"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w woman|strong="H3205"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6663"\w*?

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w he|strong="H3808"\w* putteth \w no|strong="H3808"\w* trust \w in|strong="H8064"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w ones|strong="H6918"\w*; Yea, \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w clean|strong="H2141"\w* \w in|strong="H8064"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*:

\w How|strong="H3588"\w* much \w less|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4325"\w* \w abominable|strong="H8581"\w* \w and|strong="H8354"\w* corrupt, \w A|strong="H3068"\w* man \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w drinketh|strong="H8354"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* \w like|strong="H5766"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*!

\w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H2088"\w* \w show|strong="H2331"\w* \w thee|strong="H8085"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w thou|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w*; \w And|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w which|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H8085"\w* \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w will|strong="H2088"\w* \w declare|strong="H5608"\w*

(Which \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w men|strong="H2450"\w* \w have|strong="H2450"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w From|strong="H5046"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* fathers, \w and|strong="H2450"\w* \w have|strong="H2450"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w hidden|strong="H3582"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w*;

\w Unto|strong="H5414"\w* whom alone \w the|strong="H5414"\w* land \w was|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w*, \w And|strong="H5674"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*):

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* \w travaileth|strong="H2342"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w pain|strong="H2342"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, Even \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* laid \w up|strong="H6845"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w oppressor|strong="H6184"\w*.

\w A|strong="H3068"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w terrors|strong="H6343"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H6963"\w* \w his|strong="H7703"\w* ears; \w In|strong="H6963"\w* \w prosperity|strong="H7965"\w* \w the|strong="H6963"\w* \w destroyer|strong="H7703"\w* \w shall|strong="H7703"\w* come \w upon|strong="H7965"\w* \w him|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* believeth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w waited|strong="H6822"\w* \w for|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w wandereth|strong="H5074"\w* \w abroad|strong="H5074"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \add saying\add*, \w Where|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*? \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w ready|strong="H3559"\w* \w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Distress|strong="H6862"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w anguish|strong="H4691"\w* make \w him|strong="H4428"\w* \w afraid|strong="H1204"\w*; \w They|strong="H6862"\w* \w prevail|strong="H8630"\w* \w against|strong="H6862"\w* \w him|strong="H4428"\w*, \w as|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w ready|strong="H6264"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H4428"\w* \w battle|strong="H3593"\w*.

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H3027"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H5186"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w*, \w And|strong="H3027"\w* behaveth \w himself|strong="H3027"\w* proudly \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*;

He \w runneth|strong="H7323"\w* upon him \w with|strong="H6677"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \add stiff\add* \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*, \w With|strong="H6677"\w* \w the|strong="H7323"\w* \w thick|strong="H5672"\w* \w bosses|strong="H1354"\w* \w of|strong="H4043"\w* \w his|strong="H7323"\w* \w bucklers|strong="H4043"\w*;

\w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H6440"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w fatness|strong="H2459"\w*, \w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w gathered|strong="H6213"\w* \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w loins|strong="H3689"\w*;

\w And|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* hath \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w desolate|strong="H3582"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w In|strong="H3427"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w which|strong="H1004"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* man \w inhabited|strong="H3427"\w*, \w Which|strong="H1004"\w* \w were|strong="H3427"\w* \w ready|strong="H6257"\w* \w to|strong="H1004"\w* become \w heaps|strong="H1530"\w*;

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w rich|strong="H6238"\w*, \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H5186"\w* \w substance|strong="H2428"\w* \w continue|strong="H6965"\w*, \w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H5186"\w* possessions \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w extended|strong="H5186"\w* \w on|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* earth.

\w He|strong="H4480"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*; \w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w flame|strong="H7957"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w his|strong="H5493"\w* \w branches|strong="H3127"\w*, \w And|strong="H6310"\w* \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \add Godâ€™s\add* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H4480"\w* \w go|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* trust \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*, \w deceiving|strong="H8582"\w* himself; \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w* \w shall|strong="H8545"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* recompense.

\w It|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w accomplished|strong="H4390"\w* \w before|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H4390"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H4390"\w* \w branch|strong="H3712"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w green|strong="H7488"\w*.

He \w shall|strong="H2132"\w* shake \w off|strong="H7993"\w* \w his|strong="H7993"\w* unripe \w grape|strong="H1154"\w* as \w the|strong="H7993"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, \w And|strong="H1612"\w* \w shall|strong="H2132"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w off|strong="H7993"\w* \w his|strong="H7993"\w* \w flower|strong="H5328"\w* as \w the|strong="H7993"\w* \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* \w tree|strong="H2132"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w company|strong="H5712"\w* \w of|strong="H5712"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w godless|strong="H2611"\w* \w shall|strong="H5712"\w* \w be|strong="H3588"\w* \w barren|strong="H1565"\w*, \w And|strong="H5712"\w* fire \w shall|strong="H5712"\w* consume \w the|strong="H3588"\w* tents \w of|strong="H5712"\w* \w bribery|strong="H7810"\w*.

\w They|strong="H4820"\w* \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w* \w mischief|strong="H5999"\w*, \w and|strong="H2029"\w* \w bring|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5999"\w*, \w And|strong="H2029"\w* \w their|strong="H3559"\w* heart \w prepareth|strong="H3559"\w* \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w*.
